item.title: CTL Chromebook J2
item.description: The CTL Chromebook J2 for Education is a powerful low-price laptop for students and teachers. It has a rugged design and an 11.6-inch anti-glare display.

item.title: Lenovo N21 Chromebook 80MG0001US
item.description: The Lenovo N21 Chromebook 80MG0001US is an 11.6-inch laptop with 4 GB RAM and 16 GB SSD targeted at students. It comes with a retractable handle.

item.title: Sector 5 E1 Rugged Chromebook
item.description: The Sector 5 E1 is a cheap rugged Chromebook targeted at the education market. It is scratch and spill resistant and comes with a carrying handle so you can carry it like a briefcase.
